Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Mutation A464V was not found in 18 unrelated MLD patients and 50 controls .

Let's think step by step.

There are no "Disease" entities mentioned in the paragraph. The paragraph only mentions a mutation (Mutation A464V) and its absence in a group of patients with a certain condition (MLD patients) and a control group. It does not explicitly mention any disease.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Disease.
There are no disease entities in the paragraph to keep.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".
